Mayor & City Council
====================

212 N. Live Oak Rockport TX 78382

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/212+N.+Live+Oak+Rockport+TX+78382)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

212 N. Live Oak  
Rockport, TX 78382

Phone:

361-729-2213 ext 225

Fax:

361-790-5966

[Email City Hall](mailto:sgoodwin@rockporttx.gov)
